For a cocktail-casual event you gotta strike a balance between formal and relaxed attire. Here are some suggestions:
Blazer or Sport Coat: Opt for a well-fitted blazer or sport coat. It adds a touch of sophistication without being overly formal.
Button-down Shirt: Choose a button-down shirt in a solid color or subtle pattern. Crisp white or light blue shirts are classic options.
Dress Pants or Chinos: Pair your shirt and blazer with dress pants or chinos. Stick to neutral colors like black navy gray or khaki.
Smart Shoes: Complete your look with a pair of smart shoes such as dress shoes loafers or oxfords. Make sure they're clean and polished.
Accessories: Add some personality with accessories like a stylish watch a pocket square or a leather belt. Just remember not to overdo it.
Optional Tie: Depending on the formality of the event you may or may not need a tie. If you choose to wear one go for a silk tie in a classic color or subtle pattern.

I know this doesnâ€™t sound â€˜casualâ€™ but â€˜cocktail casualâ€™ is all about looking your best but still being ready to party later on. So go wild loser. Here are some looks I pulled together for you:
